resources.string: This app need access to your location to propose the best experience.
Returned from settings to Nant\\\'oilettes with the following permissions : \\nLocation: %s

This application is not a lucrative one, developed firstly for fun. \nThe main goal is to provide a list of public toilets, in the metropolis of Nantes, France. \nDatas from \'Nantes Méropole\', and available on \'Open Data Nantes Métropole\' website.
